about_the_game:
OPUS: Rocket of Whispers Official Artbook + Bonus World Map!

This curated companion piece for OPUS: Rocket of Whispers includes 30+ pages of gorgeous character art, maps, and environments, along with previously unseen concepts from early development that are revealed for the first time in this beautiful collection!

Exclusive Bonus: Greater Hetmis Region Map

An intricate map that unveils the world of OPUS: Rocket of Whispers, lovingly rendered by SIGONO's art team. Includes locations the story took place in displayed in full detail, and many unseen corners that were unreachable within the game.

OPUS: Rocket of Whispers is a game we poured our heart and souls into, this collection provides an intimate look at how the team created John and Fei's post-apocolyptic world.

*The artbook will initially be released in Traditional Chinese only. A separate English version will be released promptly after for everyone who owns the artbook.
